verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump ’s combative style] [V: reminds] [ARG2: me] [ARG1: of a certain three - time national champion basketball coach] . But like that coach , Trump has more wins than losses .
Trump ’s combative style reminds me of a certain three - time national champion basketball coach . But [ARGM-MNR: like that coach] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: has] [ARG1: more wins than losses] .
